meanings.definition: To separate or disconnect (something) from a link or chain.
meanings.sent1: She was unlinking the necklace from the chain.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was unlinking the broken parts to fix the machine.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed a trick by unlinking two rings and then linking them back together.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to quit her job was like unlinking herself from a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's power was to unlink any chains with just a touch.

meanings.definition: The act of removing a connection or association between two things.
meanings.sent1: The unlinking of the two countries led to a peaceful separation.
meanings.sent2: The unlinking of the old and new technology caused confusion among the users.
meanings.sent3: The unlinking of the twins' hands made them realize how much they relied on each other.
meanings.sent4: The unlinking of the internet connection left everyone disconnected from the world.
meanings.sent5: The unlinking of the friendship was a painful process for both of them.
